item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Kelly's

Kelly's is one of the newer Irish pubs in the area, located near the corner of Crown and Temple under the Kelly House apartments. (at the former location of the Marius.) There is of course the Irish wood work at the bar, a nice fireplace decor in the dinning room, and for those that want to get a full dinner you could get a table on the patio (weather permitting). The menu features a mix of a few old Irish favorites and more common American fare.

Drink Special Details are still a little Sketchy here's what I've been told:
Name/Brand TBD, but some of their drafts will be $2.50.
Name/Brand TBD, but there will be a $3 bottle offered.
Type TBD, but there will be a $5 Martini offered.
Some Free nibbles will be put out in the bar area.

Sorry I can't get more specific than that, but still could be good deals! Hope to see you all tonight!

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Pub:
www.kellysnewhaven.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Kelly's
